revised_title: Exploring the Alterations and Structure of Basaltic Rocks in Northern Ireland
tldr: Dr. William Richardson examines the alterations and structure of basaltic rocks in the counties of Derry and Antrim, focusing on the Giant's Causeway and the surrounding area. He investigates the various strata and their thickness, as well as the dykes that intersect them, providing insights into the geological history of the region.
